name: Florida Council of Independent Schools
description: FCIS is Florida's premier organization for independent schools, providing accreditation services that ensure member schools meet rigorous standards for academic excellence, governance, and student welfare. FCIS-accredited schools demonstrate commitment to continuous improvement and best practices in independent school education.
recognition: FCIS accreditation is recognized by the Florida Department of Education and is accepted by colleges and universities. FCIS is a member of the National Association of Independent Schools (NAIS).
